regen.absent_element: recovery process after data corruption or loss
regen.new_specification: The system shall restore data from backup storage in case of data corruption or loss during archival storage transfers.

regen.absent_element: automated recovery process after error detection
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically initiate a recovery process for corrupted files or data after detecting errors during archival storage transfers.

regen.absent_element: error correction or recovery procedure after detecting errors
regen.new_specification: The system shall initiate error correction or recovery procedures when data integrity checks detect corruption or errors during Archival Storage transfers.

label: disaster recovery capabilities including data recovery
